{"id":1374257891,"question_id":3540,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1725115278,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1374257891/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Hash Divided String","memory":"10.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string stringHash(string s, int k) {\n        \n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i+=k) {\n            int sum = 0;\n            for (int j=i; j<i+k; j++) \n                sum += s[j]-'a';\n            sum %= 26;\n            ans += sum+'a';\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"hash-divided-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
